content:
Today I chose issue 1858 for discussion!

Define Banach algebras
Created by @Yury G. Kudryashov (@urkud) on 2020-01-06
Labels: feature-request

Is this issue still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
And we have exponential in banach algebras.
Though we still need some glue code about formal series with terms made from docs#continuous_multilinear_map.mk_pi_algebra
